titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the treatment of tenant-stockholders in cooperative housing corporations also shall apply to stockholders of corporations that only own the land on which the residences are located.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/30/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the treatment of tenant-stockholders in cooperative housing corporations also shall apply to stockholders of corporations that only own the land on which the residences (except mobile homes) are located.
